LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.label: 一枚布
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.description: A full-body garment crafted using neolithic tools. While it may look primitive, it is effective at insulating the wearer.
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.label: パーカー
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.description: パーカーは気温が低く寒い日でも暖かくいられます。
LanguageData.Apparel_Pants.label: ズボン
LanguageData.Apparel_Pants.description: シンプルなズボンです。
LanguageData.Apparel_BasicShirt.label: Ｔシャツ
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.label: 襟付きシャツ
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.description: 見なりが整ってみえるボタンのついた襟付きシャツです。
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.label: ダスターコート
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.description: ダスターコートは、屋外において日差しや砂塵を寄せつけません。
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.label: ジャケット
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.description: 丈夫なジャケットは、引っ掻き傷を受けなくなります。薄ら寒い日でも身体を暖かいままにします。
LanguageData.Apparel_PlateArmor.label: プレートアーマー
LanguageData.Apparel_PlateArmor.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.label: 防弾チョッキ
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.description: A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. While quite effective at deflecting gunshots and stabbing attacks against the chest, it does nothing to protect the limbs.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.label: 防弾パンツ
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.description: A pair of pants with armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakJacket.label: flak jacket
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakJacket.description: A tough fabric jacket with armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: パワーアーマー
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: A suit of powered armor. Layered plasteel-weave plates are very effective at stopping attacks. Neuro-memetic robotics allow a human to wear the heavy armor and still be capable of moving easily.\n\nPowered armor usually used by heavy infantry and space marines from spacer-tech militaries.
